title: I Adopted a Villainous Dad
summary:
One day I woke up and I was six years old. I had transmigrated into the main character of a tragic novel, Saint Priscilla, who walks through all sorts of thorny paths! Since I’m here, I need to avoid the scheduled special misfortune and live happily with my favorite character. The final boss of the story and the villain, Melchizedek, the tyrant of the Rehel Empire, who has no blood or tears! A happy life of adopting my father and becoming a princess, with my favorite character. I also saved the male protagonist, in order to remove my father’s death flag.

“If you approach my daughter, you will die.”

Why does my father keep putting up death flags?

Moreover… “If you tamed me, you have to take responsibility.”

Why is the male lead so obsessed with me? What’s going on?

---
One day, a girl awakens as 6-year-old St. Priscilla, the heroine of her most cherished novel. The catch? She is destined to suffer with an abusive adoptive family! To avoid this, she adopts her ultimate bias, the ruthless Emperor Melkiades, as her father instead. Although spending her days fangirling and redeeming her bias's tarnished name seems like a dream come true, with so many foes still lurking in the shadows, can this young saint protect Melkiades and find happiness for them both?

title: Manager Kim
summary:
"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.

title: I Tamed the Enemy Prince
summary: After losing his life in an accident, Kazuma finds himself reincarnated as the Ascalon Empire's third prince, Ares.  He wasn't born with the "stigmata", the proof that one is royalty and gives them extraordinary abilities, however, he still received love from his family and spent his days in peace. Until one day, his father's first wife, Germa barged into their home, and looked at Ares in contempt for not having a stigmata. In the end, she even put his mother, Erina in danger. Realizing how powerless he truly was, Ares decided to protect his family with his own power. He decides to enroll into Ascalon Academy, a prestigious school where one's capability decides everything!

title: For the Young Villain’s Happy Ending
summary:
[There was a pitiful girl who cried tears of diamond and lived while being abused by her family. But a prince appeared and killed off the entirety of the evil family. And so, the girl lived happily ever after with the prince.]

...is the fairy tale, but I reincarnated as the evil sister, 'Marcia Blick'?!

This damned household! I have to escape from this house now, at least! But if I run away, what about my sister who will be left behind? I've made my decision! We're going to run away together!

'Larisa. Let's go find that prince who will make you happy!'

But: "Please marry me."

Prince, why are you proposing to me? Your partner isn't me, but my sister! This sister of yours will make you a 'perfect ending plan'!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54970327), [Naver Series](http://naver.me/GLuxzytv)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%99%ED%99%94-%EC%86%8D-%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%98-%EC%99%84%EB%B2%BD%ED%95%9C-%EC%97%94%EB%94%A9-%ED%94%8C%EB%9E%9C/2867), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58925157)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-perfect-plan-for-a-fairy-tale-ending/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26297&contentId=297&platform=IA)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%8D%E6%B4%BE%E4%B9%9F%E6%83%B3%E8%A6%81%E6%9C%89%E5%AE%8C%E7%BE%8E%E7%B5%90%E5%B1%80/331)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Perfect-Plan-for-a-Fairy-Tale-Ending/571)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112309)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%93%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2/382)

title: The Chaebeol’s Youngest Son
summary:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Miss Not-So Sidekick
summary:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Peanutoon)](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/5005)
- [Alternative Raw (BookCube)](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=180108)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Terjebak-Peran-Figuran/2646)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/3983)
- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/miss-second-role)

title: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home
summary:
Lady Solea's family can't figure out how she lost her memories or why she keeps raving about her "jackpot." They don't realize she's actually Yoon Jiyoon, a lottery winner who was suddenly brought into their world! Determined to return to her reality and claim her riches, Jiyoon sets off a series of shenanigans to send herself home. Yet when Solea's family proves more fun than expected and distracts her from the mission to leave, Jiyoon begins to wonder if family is worth more than a fortune...

---
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
summary:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

title: My Husband Was Stolen Twice
summary: What if your whole life was predetermined? When Noelle Ainelle is reborn as an evil marchioness, she learns she is fated to die alongside her 5-year-old daughter at her husband’s hands. But with a new attitude and a will to live, Noelle resolves to salvage her marriage for their daughter’s sake. Too bad her husband, Rupert Ainelle, is a war-loving marquess who knows nothing but violence. With the clock ticking before the unthinkable, can this villainess make peace with her warmonger husband?

title: I’ll Borrow Your Face
summary:
1-3. Though I'd Always Loved You  
When Saki was in elementary school, she was dumped without notice by Chikage who was eight years her senior. She was extremely shocked because she believed that he would be her future husband! With a change of attitude, while at the high school entrance ceremony she decided that she dreamed of finding a new love, but at that time she met Chikage again, who has now become a teacher. As usual, she is shocked to realize that she still has feelings for Chikage. How does Chikage feel about Saki…?!  
  
4. My Lovely Beast  
Modoka decides to confess to her long-time crush, but accidentally gets the wrong person!?  
  
5. Love, to Burn, Fingertip  
Mari wants to be a manicurist, but is too shy to ask to paint someone's nails. Is her dream already out of reach?  
  
6. In my Shining Eyes, I See Your Face  
When Tae falls down the stairs, it might just change her world…

title: Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint
summary: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.

title: When a K-Eldest Daughter Possesses a Childcare Novel
The Ten Thousand Races Invasion: Guardian of the Rear
summary: Invasion of the Ten Thousand Clans, universal superpowers, the era beyond time has arrived! In this age, all citizens are drafted to resist the foreign races and defend against external humiliation. Nan Ziying, at the tender age of adulthood, chooses to stay behind at the recruitment center, serving as logistical support. Many soldiers are disappointed, the youth scorn him, and white-haired elders take up arms and leave, leaving him behind with only women, children, and the elderly to guard the rear. Later, Nan Ziying awakens five great abilities and silently prepares. In this era where countless clans reign supreme and the times are filled with tragic heroism, ‘I am the calamity of these ten thousand clans!'

title: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God
summary: A thousand years ago, under the blood moon, spatial rifts opened, heralding the era of monsters! Countless monsters rampaged across the globe! Just as humanity was on the brink of complete extinction, the emergence of “Beast Spirit Masters” brought a glimmer of hope to all of humanity! With generations of inheritance and the development of “Beast Spirit Masters”, humanity successfully created a new civilizational order to combat the monster invasion! Lin Yuan, who was a top assassin in his previous life but was tragically betrayed and killed by his organization, transmigrates…

title: All Football Talents Are Mine
summary: Uho-yeong had dreamed of becoming a soccer player. However, he was not blessed with the talent and died without realizing his dream, struck by lightning. It was then that the demon Mammon appeared, offering the ability to covet everyone's talents...

title: Put Me To Sleep
summary: Bakuya, a second-year high school student suffering from insomnia, however, one night, he meets Kimidori, a first-year girl who enjoys eating cup noodles yakisoba. Kimidori claims she can help Bakuya sleep; nevertheless, she enjoys playing pranks on him whenever she gets the chance.

title: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef
summary:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!

title: Ancestor is beautiful and elegant
Darling, Why Do You Regret It?
summary:
I secretly met my husband's mistress. Delicate, lovely, and sweet, her name was Saira.

“I’ll never leave the Duke!”

“Now, *that’s* the spirit.”

“W-what?”

I had reincarnated as Tareia—a noblewoman with a wealthy family, beauty, and nothing to feel inferior about in life. But there was just one obstacle in my perfect plan: “Keep seducing my husband.”

I was ready to toss him aside and live a fabulous single life. 

...Or so I thought.

“I’m starting to find you fascinating.”

“Can I call you... 'Lea'?”

“My lady, please, anything but divorce.”

Why are these men suddenly acting like this?!

---
Watching on helplessly as her beloved husband carried on a whirlwind affair with a beautiful commoner, then dying tragically only to be replaced right away by that same mistress, Duchess DeLov was a pitiful figure... in the book I didn't even bother finishing! Okay, well, I'm not going to live that way. Step one: Ruin his reputation. Step two: Secure a divorce. Step three: Enjoy my happy, rich, single life! ...Step four: Fake a relationship with a handsome stranger to shake off our stalkers.

---
Tareya DeLov awakens in a novel to find herself married to the cold and aloof Duke Anteros Mel DeLov, who's cheating on her with a mistress! Appalled, she immediately petitions for divorce, hoping to keep her share of wealth and win the public's sympathy. But as the divorce comes closer to being approved, Anteros won't leave Tareya alone, remorseful and relentlessly begging her to reconsider. Will Tareya succeed in separating from her husband? And what's with Anteros' sudden shift in attitude?

title: Regressor Instruction Manual
summary:
[Will you join the game?]

Giyoung's suddenly thrown into a game of life and death. Not only that, but he's also the player with the lowest stats. Still, he's got one skill on his side: the ability to read other players' status!

He finds the opportunity of his life when he discovers that Hyunsung is a returner to this world.

Now all Giyoung has to do is stick next to Hyunsung and game his way out of this tutorial.

title: The secrets of the lovely duchess
summary:
Luclia is a girl who was trapped in the demon archduke's dungeon for seven years and saw ghosts. One day the prison wall collapsed and a man came.

"Wow! are you a prince?"
"Sorry, I'm just a duke."

Davier, Duke of the House of Montenfeltro. Sure enough, with his temperamental and violent personality, he would take Luclia, an unknown girl, as his princess?!

"Duke, I wonder why you brought her here..."

Luclia, who has just entered the word with the mysterious Duke Davier. Can two people understand each other and still be happy?

title: One Day, I Suddenly Got a Crush
summary: Miran Katsuki, a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste, often asks Shuji Nagasawa, an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior, but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancée!?

title: It’s Annoying Because My Childhood Friend Is An Archmage
summary: A cynical noblewoman cursed to hear others' thoughts struggles to control her childhood friend—a wildly powerful mage whose flirting is as explosive as his unchecked magic. His outrageous marriage proposals ("I'll conquer the empire for you!") and her exasperated damage control create a hilarious magical rom-com where keeping him sane might just drive her mad first.

title: Starting As The God Of Wealth, Taming Billions Of Divine Pets!
summary:
The apocalypse game swept across the globe and merged with the real world, causing the collapse of order. In his previous life, Ye Xiao devoted everything to elevating his fiancée, Liu Ruyan, to the pinnacle of power, only to have his heart literally ripped out by her on the day of their engagement and transplanted into her male best friend. Reborn into a new life, Ye Xiao resolves to ascend the throne alone. Before the game closes its recharge portal, he spends billions of his fortune to switch to a god-level profession.

---

**Original Webtoon**: 
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/24688)

title: Fated to Be Loved by Villains
summary:
One day, he reincarnated in the game Savior Rising as Daud Campbell, a powerless noble living on the outskirts. He decides to live quietly, avoiding others' attention.

On his first day inside the game, he gets involved with the final boss, also known as the vessel of the grey demon, Elnore Elinarize la Tristan.

After their encounter, the protagonist gains two special rewards: [Desperate Survival], which makes him stronger when his rate of survival decreases, and [Deadly Charm], which charms those who have evil traits. With the use of his skills, he calmly overcomes the challenges with his veteran expertise.

But every time he overcomes a challenge, those with evil traits become interested in him...

Finally, he received his end goal.

"Put this continent's fate on the line and charm all of them."

---

**Original Webtoon:**     
- [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/66116309)
- [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/-/4409)

**Official Translations:**     
- [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/173962)

title: The Delusional Hunter in Another
summary:
"I have a little secret. I'm from an alien planet far, far away.

However... fate had other plans. I found myself reincarnated into the body of someone who had literally starved to death! Will Gi-ryeo be able to find a way to adapt to this strange planet called Earth and keep his true identity hidden?"

title: Let’s Go to your House, Oppa
summary:
Florence Café’s owner, Yoo Ji-an, has someone who feels more like an older brother than her real one.

That person is Choi Jae-geon, the heir of Hwaseong Construction, who never misses a chance to get on Ji-an’s nerves.

One day, after an unexpected incident leaves Ji-an with nowhere to go, Jae-geon is the one to reach out first.

“Come to my place.”

And so begins their cohabitation.

They’ve always bickered and clashed at every turn, but suddenly, the atmosphere between them starts to shift.

Then, with just one sentence from Jae-geon—

“Come to my room.”

Ji-an’s heart starts to race.

KIM's hit novel, Come to My Place, now adapted into a webtoon!
Familiar yet unfamiliar, in a home that isn’t her own—
A fiery love-hate romance begins!

title: One Day My Sister Died
summary: A short Twitter manga by Hamaken wherein a brother's younger sister struggles to maintain eye contact with him, except...

title: Moonshark: Sharks Are Born To Be Stars
summary:
Princess Sid of the Underwater Kingdom is destined to inherit the throne of the sea. However, she becomes a fan of the land idol 'Raon', and she becomes eager to see her favourite star, so she runs away to the surface.
While leading a satisfying life as an ordinary fan, Sid's world is suddenly turned upside down when she meets the famous actor 'Jihan'. Unintentionally, the two keep getting entangled with each other, and Sid unexpectedly becomes an SNS star overnight…!!
This story captures Sid's journey of growth and love as she navigates her new life on land, discovering herself between the two worlds of the underwater kingdom and the human world.

---
Sid, who is a Shark Princess of the underwater kingdom, falls in love with Raun, a member of the boy band BUB, and runs away to the surface to see him. Things are going great until the famous teen actor, Jihan Kang, steps into her life unexpectedly and they keep crossing paths. Will Sid be able to keep her secret and get what she came up to the surface for?

title: I Acted As the Adopted Daughter Too Well
Return of the Namgung Clan’s Granddaughter
summary:
Following the wishes of her master, Blood Demon, Il-hwa destroys the Namgung clan, but as she faces death, she hears a shocking revelation due to Blood Demon's betrayal.  

 “Now, you are the only Namgung left in the world.”  

Il-hwa learns that she was the long-lost child of the Namgung clan, Seol-hwa, and that she was raised for Blood Demon's evil schemes. Having returned to her thirteen-year-old self from a tragic death, Il-hwa — or rather, Namgung Seol-hwa — realizes that an opportunity to change the future has arrived and takes steps to prevent the Namgung clan's annihilation.

Will Seol-hwa succeed in stopping the Blood Demon from annihilating her clan and achieving revenge?

title: The God of War is Leveling Up
summary:
Suhyeok, the greatest martial artist on the continentr, has unified the martial world. He had achieved everything, yet a lingering emptiness in his heart remained unfulfilled by his yearning for family… 

In the end, he crossed dimensions using the power of sorcery, but what lay before his eyes was...

"I was in a coma for five years in a hospital!? And what’s with this system window floating in front of me!?"

During the five years he lay unconscious, his family had been struggling to pay his hospital bills.  For his family’s sake, he needs to make money - fast and a lot of it. 

The strongest Martial God of the Hwan Continent, Suhyeok! Now Awakened, he begins his journey to level up.

title: I Became the Mother of the Supporting Male Lead’s Son
summary: Our protagonist wakes up one day to find herself as Elia, the daughter of a bankrupt baron and a side character in a romance-fantasy novel. While on the run from debt collectors, she saves a child from an attacker -- only to be accused of being the kidnapper by the child’s guardian, Duke Kaiden. Taken to his mansion, she’s forced to live with them and be the child’s nanny. Can Elia clear up the misunderstanding and find her way out of this mess?

title: Dungeon Architect
summary:
Kang Chiwoo lost his life in an accident and got reincarnated as the son of a great demon lord in another world.

Unlike his previous life as a map designer, he is now a loser named Kella.

However, in a world where magic exists and having realized the dormant power of Kella, Chiwoo sets out to achieve his goal of creating his dream map that he couldn't make in his past life...

Will Kella be able to create his own map while fending off his brothers who constantly try to kill him, the countless threats upon his life, and the pressure of those around him who want him to succeed the throne?

title: Welcome to the Rose Mansion
summary: No summary available.

title: The Ending, I Want to Change it
summary: Byun Soo-ah, an impoverished novelist who only writes bad endings, is possessed by someone's curse as Choi Se-hwa, the villainess of 'End of Youth', which is currently being serialized. Can Su-ah survive and return to her original world in a novel full of traitors, sociopaths, double personalities, and psychopaths?

title: My School Life Pretending To Be a Worthless Person
summary:
The world discovered the essence of the human soul, Ideia, and found a way to materialize it. The stronger one's Ideia, the more power one has.

In a society where hierarchy is determined by this power, F-Rank Park Jinsung has always been his school's punching bag. In reality, though, he is an S-Rank with extreme bloodlust, which he has been hiding to keep others safe.

With only two years left of high school, will Jinsung be able to hide his killer side and prove rank isn't everything?

---
- [Webtoon Teaser](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RNHjCpXtHpI)

title: I’ll Change the Ending Through Home Education
I Will Pay the Price for Deceiving You With My Life
summary:
I have lived only for my father. I willingly endured all suffering for the sake of avenging my father. After training in excruciating pain, I became the best assassin.

I believed in him my whole life. I lived only for my father my whole life. I even killed people for my father.

But that father was not my father. The person I killed was my real "father."

Having been deceived by a demon my entire life and killed my own father, I drank the poison he offered and died.

That must have been the case.

But I wasn't dead? When I opened my eyes, my body had shrunk. I had returned to my childhood.

title: The Hero Became The Duke’s Eldest Son
summary: No one understands why local lowlife Lord Aden Remes suddenly acts like the upright knight he was meant to be. The truth is, Aden's been possessed by Aden Albireo, the empire's hero who died after defeating the villainous Underlord and facing betrayal by his closest friends. Now, Aden's out to get revenge on those who killed him with the help of a few new allies and none other than the Underlord himself! Can Aden and his gang buckle down and power up? Or is the lord hero fated to fail once more?

title: Infinite Mage
summary:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

title: I’m a Supporting Role in a Horror Game, Don’t Kill Me
The Lord’s Coins Aren’t Decreasing?!
summary: Aaron Steelegard's fortune was basically set as he discovered a book that allowed him to trade across dimensions—until his enemies take both his life and his riches away. But Aaron is brought back as his younger self, armed with his past knowledge and a chance at revenge! Now free to amass coins, he's gaining powerful abilities and moving up the ranks of the interdimensional trading markets. Will Aaron gain enough coins to survive this journey of vengeance and reclaim his honor?

title: The Reason Why That Villainess Picked Up A Sword
summary:
Erin suffered her entire life from the abuse of the Marchioness and the malicious rumors she spread, until she finally died.

After two reincarnations, she returned as a genius Sword Master.

This time, everything will be different.

title: Rejecting The Perfect Marriage
summary:
The Tezen ducal family, wielding the utmost power, and O’Hara County, possessing all the wealth in the world—their union could not have been more perfect than this.

Except there was no burning love.

“Evangeline O’Hara is a prepared duchess. It would be troublesome to find another woman now, and there is no guarantee that she would do as well as Evangeline.”

For Dekarno, there was no Duchess better than her.

So, if it was only about bankruptcy, he could bear with it.

However, she couldn’t.

“Let’s put an end to this, now.”

“…Are you suggesting canceling the engagement?”

“Yes.”

Evangeline had given up everything she had brought so far and now walked away barehanded.

By relinquishing everything, she could let go of that man, too.

Even the feelings she had held alone.

“I liked you, Your Grace.”

“….”

“No way. Your Grace didn’t think I was only coveting the position of Duchess, did you?”

How could she leave so easily after claiming she liked him? Dekarno couldn’t understand, and his anger boiled inside.

The increasingly entangled events, the complicated thoughts—all of it traced back to that woman.

In the end, there was no choice but to put everything back in its place.

He set out to find Evangeline, who was desperately trying to stand on her own.

“You claim you’ll survive. It’s unbearable for a mere human like me to endure.”

title: The Male Lead Is Obsessed With Proposing to Me
summary: Trapped in a story where the male lead must love her to survive, a woman dedicates eight years to manipulating his heart—silent stalking, strategic appearances, engineered coincidences. But when her coldly planned "happy ending" arrives, she learns a hard lesson: you can't control love without losing yourself.

title: Return of the Apocalypse-Class Death Knight
summary:
Damien Haksen was once a gifted warrior with a bright future, but everything changed when a powerful Archlich twisted him into a Death Knight. Controlled by dark magic, he murdered his own family and helped destroy a kingdom. He broke free at the very end — too late to undo the damage. 

But fate gave him one more chance.

Now back in the past, Damien is determined to protect the people he once lost and destroy the dark mages who turned his life into a nightmare. This time, he’ll fight not for glory, but for love, redemption, and the future of his family.

title: Talent-Swallowing Magician
summary:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

title: Survival Story of a Sword King in a Fantasy World
summary:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---
